text:
Dummy is still on fire safety.
If you douse me again,

And I'm not on fire,
I'm donating you
to a city college.

All right,
nice and easy.

Seriously,
just gonna start off
with 1% thrust capacity.
And three, two, one.
Okay.

Please don't
follow me around
with it, either,

'cause I feel like I'm gonna
catch on fire spontaneously.

Just stand down!
If something happens,
then come in.

And again,
let's bring it up to 2.5.
Three, two, one.
(grunting)

Okay, this is where
I don't want to be!

Oh, not the car,
not the car!
(exclaims)
Table!
(laughing nervously)

Could be worse!
Could be worse!
We're fine! Okay.
No! Uh-uh! Uh-uh! Uh!
Yeah, I can fly.
